name: Chartered Management Institute
description: The Chartered Management Institute works with businesses and education providers to inspire people to unleash their potential and become skilled, confident and successful managers and leaders. In fact, CMI has more than 60,000 people training to be better leaders right now across our partner network in the UK and internationally. Backed by a unique Royal Charter, CMI is the only organisation able to award Chartered Manager status - the ultimate management accolade, which is proven to boost individuals’ career prospects, management capability and impact in the workplace. CMI’s thought leadership, research, events and online resources provide practical insight about critical issues for its 100,000 plus members and any professional looking to improve their results; create diverse high-performing teams and nurture the next generation of managers and leaders.
features: 5% say that Chartered Manager demonstrates their use of managerial skills to achieve organisational results
81% say that since becoming Chartered, they have used their managerial skills to lead people and manage change
78% say that since becoming Chartered, they have had a positive impact on the wider team in their organisation (such as increased employee engagement)
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We work with business and education to inspire people to become skilled, confident and successful managers and leaders.
ShortDescription: The Chartered Management Institute works with businesses and education providers to inspire people to unleash their potential and become skilled, confident and successful managers and leaders.
enhanced_description: The Chartered Management Institute (CMI) is a prominent professional body dedicated to fostering skilled, confident, and successful managers and leaders. Established in 1947 and operating under a unique Royal Charter, CMI holds the exclusive authority to award Chartered Manager status, a highly regarded accolade that significantly boosts individuals' career prospects, management capability, and overall workplace impact. CMI actively supports over 60,000 individuals engaged in leadership training through its extensive partner network across the UK and internationally. The institute further enriches its community of over 100,000 members and other professionals through comprehensive thought leadership, research, events, and online resources. CMI's offerings are designed to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, enabling professionals to improve their results, cultivate diverse high-performing teams, and effectively nurture the next generation of management and leadership talent.
competitive_advantages: Exclusive authority to award Chartered Manager status (backed by a unique Royal Charter)
Proven impact on career prospects, management capability, and workplace results
Extensive partner network and large membership base (over 100,000 members, 60,000 trainees)
Comprehensive suite of resources including thought leadership, research, events, and online materials
implementation_scenarios: Integration into educational curricula for management studies
roi_benefits: Achieve organizational results through enhanced managerial skills
Improved ability to lead people and manage change
Positive impact on wider team performance and employee engagement
Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Nurturing of future management and leadership talent
